examples: the push of the water on the walls of the tank
the thrust of the jet engines

definitions.text: a strong blow with a knife or other sharp pointed instrument
examples: one strong stab to the heart killed him

definitions.text: the act of applying force to propel something
examples: after reaching the desired velocity the drive is cut off
he enlivened his editorials with barbed thrusts at politicians

definitions.text: a sharp hand gesture (resembling a blow)
examples: he warned me with a jab with his finger
he made a thrusting motion with his fist
She thrust the letter into his hand
She forced her diet fads on him

definitions.text: penetrate or cut through with a sharp instrument

examples: The front of the trains that had collided head-on thrust up into the air

definitions.text: place or put with great energy
examples: She threw the blanket around the child
thrust the money in the hands of the beggar
